segments.text: Now , Miss Childs passed on your resume to me and I ’ Ve had the chance to look it over and I must say I ’ m quite impressed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much . I ’ Ve tried to keep it short and clear.If there ’ s any questions please feel free to ask me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well yes , I do have a number of questions , but perhaps first you could give me a brief overview I ’ d like to get a little bit of an idea of your background .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . Well as you can see from the resume I ’ m 27 and grew up in Brooklyn , New York , although our family moved to London when I was quite young , at around 16 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah I see , so you were actually educated in Europe ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes precisely . Although I was born in the US , I would definitely call London home . But as you see I ’ Ve actually spent a lot of my life moving from country to country . My Father was in the oil business
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very interesting . So it seems you had quite an adventurous childhood .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Absolutely ! We were never still for too long . But now I ’ m really looking to settle down .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Okay , well let ’ s move on to discuss your education shall we ?
segments.speaker: S1
